author: Staff Reporter
text:
The Judicial Magistrate Court extended the judicial custody of two Maoists here on Monday.

Amid tight security, the police brought Ranjith from Palayamkottai prison and Neelamegam from Tiruchi prison and produced them before the judge on Monday morning.

Judicial Magistrate C.B. Vedhagiri extended the judicial custody till January 25. They managed to escape an encounter against Maoists in Kodaikanal a few years back. Later, they were arrested by the special police team.
title: Custody of Maoists extended
